# How Can I Have My Staff Members Clock In And Clock Out On A Front Desk

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/how-can-i-have-my-staff-members-clock-in-and-clock-out-on-a-front-desk/

## Category
09 Staff And Payroll

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
STAFF MEMBERS
TIME CLOCK
Clock In and Out on a Front Desk Device

You can enable the Time Clock app on a front desk device so staff members can clock in and out. This is helpful if you would like staff members to clock in and out in person.

To set up the front desk device, open the Staff Members app.

Create a new staff member called Front Desk and enable the Can view Time Clock app permission.

Log in as the Front Desk staff member on the front desk device. Staff members can now enter their time clock PIN on the front desk device to clock in and out.

You can disable the Can view Time Clock app permission for individual staff members so they do not have access to the Time Clock app on their personal devices.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
